title: AWS Lambda Elastic IP without NAT Gateway
description: Create a Lambda function with public Elastic IP without provisioning NAT Gateway

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to create a lambda function with public elastic IP without provisioning NAT Gateway and save $33/month in non-prod environment

bullets.text: Generate a static outbound IP address using a Lambda function, Amazon VPC, and a serverless architecture

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
